2845.verse: قُلْ|Say,|50|62|765$أَطِيعُواْ|"Obey|88|111|2775$ٱللَّهَ|Allah|53|76|184$وَأَطِيعُواْ|and obey|102|125|3271$ٱلرَّسُولَ‌ۖ|the Messenger,|122|145|1284$فَإِن|but if|55|78|227$تَوَلَّوْاْ|you turn away|116|128|1245$فَإِنَّمَا|then only|82|99|1086$عَلَيْهِ|upon him|79|112|395$مَا|(is) what|80|113|262$حُمِّلَ|(is) placed on him,|143|176|12631$وَعَلَيْكُم|and on you|94|127|12632$مَّا|(is) what|80|97|262$حُمِّلْتُمْ‌ۖ|(is) placed on you.|145|158|12633$وَإِن|And if|58|84|213$تُطِيعُوهُ|you obey him,|113|139|12634$تَهْتَدُواْ‌ۚ|you will be guided.|143|169|1230$وَمَا|And not|72|98|46$عَلَى|(is) on|63|76|52$ٱلرَّسُولِ|the Messenger|117|161|4120$إِلَّا|except|65|153|86$ٱلْبَلَـٰغُ|the conveyance|127|215|2713$ٱلْمُبِينُ|[the] clear."|101|145|5465$

2846.verse: وَعَدَ ٱللَّهُ|Allah (has) promised|154|163|4353$ٱلَّذِينَ|those who|89|106|20$ءَامَنُواْ|believe|82|99|84$مِنكُمْ|among you|92|109|643$وَعَمِلُواْ|and do|92|109|238$ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ|righteous deeds,|130|139|239$لَيَسْتَخْلِفَنَّهُمْ|surely He will grant them succession|261|276|12635$فِى|in|48|78|89$ٱلْأَرْضِ|the earth,|92|122|100$كَمَا|as|53|83|110$ٱسْتَخْلَفَ|He gave succession|151|166|12636$ٱلَّذِينَ|to those who|108|115|20$مِن قَبْلِهِمْ|(were) before them,|154|168|1094$وَلَيُمَكِّنَنَّ|and that He will surely establish|231|245|12637$لَهُمْ|for them|76|90|98$دِينَهُمُ|their religion|101|108|12474$ٱلَّذِى|which|65|78|138$ٱرْتَضَىٰ|He has approved|131|158|11762$لَهُمْ|for them,|81|108|98$وَلَيُبَدِّلَنَّهُم|and surely He will change for them|249|276|12638$مِّنۢ بَعْدِ|after|91|104|280$خَوْفِهِمْ|their fear,|86|93|12639$أَمْنًا‌ۚ|security|73|87|12640$يَعْبُدُونَنِى|(for) they worship Me,|169|183|12641$لَا|not|42|56|30$يُشْرِكُونَ|they associate|118|132|7075$بِى|with Me|72|86|5353$شَيْــًٔا‌ۚ|anything.|82|89|472$وَمَن|But whoever|103|129|1012$كَفَرَ|disbelieved|92|144|950$بَعْدَ|after|52|104|1117$ذَٲلِكَ|that,|64|116|28$فَأُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ|then those|92|144|777$هُمُ|[they]|62|88|56$ٱلْفَـٰسِقُونَ|(are) the defiantly disobedient.|227|227|933$

2847.verse: وَأَقِيمُواْ|And establish|108|121|439$ٱلصَّلَوٲةَ|the prayer|91|118|38$وَءَاتُواْ|and give|83|110|440$ٱلزَّكَوٲةَ|zakah|86|113|441$وَأَطِيعُواْ|and obey|102|129|3271$ٱلرَّسُولَ|the Messenger,|122|135|1284$لَعَلَّكُمْ|so that you may|129|343|193$تُرْحَمُونَ|receive mercy.|118|332|3272$

2848.verse: لَا|(Do) not|76|88|30$تَحْسَبَنَّ|think|87|110|3492$ٱلَّذِينَ|those who|89|112|20$كَفَرُواْ|disbelieve|84|108|59$مُعْجِزِينَ|(can) escape|108|132|8424$فِى|in|48|72|89$ٱلْأَرْضِ‌ۚ|the earth.|92|104|100$وَمَأْوَٮٰهُمُ|And their abode|125|153|3369$ٱلنَّارُ‌ۖ|(will be) the Fire|129|186|762$وَلَبِئْسَ|and wretched is|126|183|980$ٱلْمَصِيرُ|the destination.|125|153|1162$

2849.verse: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ|O you who believe!|200|229|7177$لِيَسْتَــْٔذِنكُمُ|Let ask your permission|175|233|12642$ٱلَّذِينَ|those whom|100|158|20$مَلَكَتْ|possess|76|105|3677$أَيْمَـٰنُكُمْ|your right hands|128|143|3678$وَٱلَّذِينَ|and those who|118|148|42$لَمْ|(have) not|91|121|63$يَبْلُغُواْ|reached|77|107|12643$ٱلْحُلُمَ|puberty|71|101|12644$مِنكُمْ|among you|92|107|643$ثَلَـٰثَ|(at) three|86|93|10710$مَرَّٲتٍ‌ۚ|times,|79|93|12645$مِّن قَبْلِ|before|92|106|2115$صَلَوٲةِ|(the) prayer|101|115|12646$ٱلْفَجْرِ|(of) dawn,|90|104|1645$وَحِينَ|and when|84|98|1536$تَضَعُونَ|you put aside|110|117|12647$ثِيَابَكُم|your garments|115|132|12648$مِّنَ|at|50|83|156$ٱلظَّهِيرَةِ|noon|99|132|12649$وَمِنۢ بَعْدِ|and after|105|138|6731$صَلَوٲةِ|(the) prayer|101|134|12646$ٱلْعِشَآءِ‌ۚ|(of) night.|88|105|12650$ثَلَـٰثُ|(These) three|112|120|12651$عَوْرَٲتٍ|(are) times of privacy|164|180|12652$لَّكُمْ‌ۚ|for you.|72|88|207$لَيْسَ|Not|61|76|1763$عَلَيْكُمْ|on you|76|92|416$وَلَا|and not|71|86|25$عَلَيْهِمْ|on them|76|84|22$جُنَاحُۢ|any blame|87|93|1764$بَعْدَهُنَّ‌ۚ|after that|85|98|12653$طَوَّٲفُونَ|(as) moving about|141|154|12654$عَلَيْكُم|among you,|97|110|416$بَعْضُكُمْ|some of you|101|114|384$عَلَىٰ|among|63|76|52$بَعْضٍ‌ۚ|others.|76|82|1316$كَذَٲلِكَ|Thus|77|92|702$يُبَيِّنُ ٱللَّهُ|Allah makes clear|134|164|1653$لَكُمُ|for you|67|97|196$ٱلْأَيَـٰتِ‌ۗ|the Verses,|96|126|1099$وَٱللَّهُ|and Allah|80|110|167$عَلِيمٌ|(is) All-Knower,|122|137|307$حَكِيمٌ|All-Wise.|78|78|1828$

2845.verse: Say, "Obey Allah and obey the Messenger; but if you turn away - then upon him is only that [duty] with which he has been charged, and upon you is that with which you have been charged. And if you obey him, you will be [rightly] guided. And there is not upon the Messenger except the [responsibility for] clear notification."

2846.verse: Allah has promised those who have believed among you and done righteous deeds that He will surely grant them succession [to authority] upon the earth just as He granted it to those before them and that He will surely establish for them [therein] their religion which He has preferred for them and that He will surely substitute for them, after their fear, security, [for] they worship Me, not associating anything with Me. But whoever disbelieves after that - then those are the defiantly disobedient.

2847.verse: And establish prayer and give zakah and obey the Messenger - that you may receive mercy.

2848.verse: Never think that the disbelievers are causing failure [to Allah] upon the earth. Their refuge will be the Fire - and how wretched the destination.

2849.verse: O you who have believed, let those whom your right hands possess and those who have not [yet] reached puberty among you ask permission of you [before entering] at three times: before the dawn prayer and when you put aside your clothing [for rest] at noon and after the night prayer. [These are] three times of privacy for you. There is no blame upon you nor upon them beyond these [periods], for they continually circulate among you - some of you, among others. Thus does Allah make clear to you the verses; and Allah is Knowing and Wise.
